movies.title: The Crypt
movies.plot: Six young criminals break into hidden catacombs underneath their town and attempt to steal jewelry buried from the "Great Depression", only to find inhabitants guarding the precious belongings. After being trapped in this dark maze of crypts, the group tries to escape alive.
movies.simplePlot: Six young criminals break into hidden catacombs and attempt to steal jewels, but some inhabitants are guarding the precious belongings. After being trapped in this dark maze of crypts, the group tries to escape alive.

biography.bio: Sarah Oh was born and raised in Glendale, Arizona. She moved to Los Angeles, CA when she was freshly 18 after filming her first feature film in Arizona. The film, The Crypt, was released in 2009 in select theaters all over of the US. Sarah played the lead character, PJ, and fell in love with on-camera acting after studying theater for so long. Sarah began acting when she was 13 in her school's theater program and was cast as a principal role in every single main stage production there on after. Her first acting performance was in a one-act show based on the book "Go Ask Alice" and she played the role of Alice. She was thrown into the acting world pretty abruptly, performing a live suicide by ODing on sleeping pills for her first ever role. And from then, Sarah was hooked. Sarah has also been singing and dancing since she was a little girl and still finds joy in practicing both. She grew up in the spot light and finds nothing more spiritually fulfilling than to perform. Sarah can be seen films such as in Lifetime movie Dirty Teacher (2013), Altergeist (2014), and Capture (2014).
biography.name: Sarah Oh

biography.bio: Mike Ranallo is an actor, known for The Crypt (2009), Paradise Hotel (2003) and Parallax (2012).
biography.name: Mike Ranallo

biography.bio: Abra May is an actress, known for The Crypt (2009).
biography.name: Abra May

biography.bio: Cristen Irene was born as Cristen Irene Erber. She is known for her work on Criminal Minds (2005), How I Met Your Mother (2005) and Rizzoli & Isles (2010).
biography.name: Cristen Irene

biography.bio: Joanna Ke is an actress and producer, known for The Crypt (2009), Maneater (2009) and Roadies (2016).
biography.name: Joanna Ke

biography.bio: Delaina Stevens is an actress, known for The Crypt (2009) and Avé Maria (2009).
biography.name: Delaina Stevens

biography.bio: R. Keith Wilson is an actor and producer, known for A Man Called Nereus (2012), The Crypt (2009) and The Life of Riley Venn: Ghost Magnet (2012).
biography.name: R. Keith Wilson

biography.bio: Nathan Hill has been active in theater since childhood, playing the role of both director and actor. A master storyteller with a dual degree in Philosophy and Fine Art Hill has received much acclaim for his past screenplays "American Bomber" and "Hole in the Sun". His debut feature: A MAN CALLED NEREUS premiered at the 2012 Phoenix Com-icon and was well received. Not only did the film receive "Best Characters in a Film" but was also given a encore viewing. Nathan is also a documentary filmmaker. His first full-length documentary "Doc Broadus:living Legend" 2005 was celebrated as a "complete and true account" by Mr. Broadus himself. Hill is currently working on two golf television projects, a documentary about the dangers of poor nutrition and Pre-production on his next feature titled:"Rex". -Kim Wagner Hemmes
biography.name: Nathan Hill

biography.bio: Michael David Hill is known for his work on The Crypt (2009) and Dead Enders (2010).
biography.name: Michael David Hill

biography.bio: Hollywood Yates was born on February 28, 1970 in Phoenix, Arizona, USA as Don Yates. He is an actor, known for Fancypants (2011), Machined Reborn (2009) and The Crypt (2009). He has been married to Shari since 1999.
biography.name: Hollywood Yates

biography.bio: Seth Gandrud is known for his work on Roadies (2016), Durant's Never Closes (2016) and A Man Called Nereus (2012).
biography.name: Seth Gandrud

biography.bio: Savanah D. McMahon is an actress, known for The Crypt (2009), A Box of Faith (2015) and Dead Ring (2016).
biography.name: Savanah D. McMahon

biography.bio: E. Adam Thomas is an actor, known for The Crypt (2009) and Coyote Requiem (2014).
biography.name: E. Adam Thomas
